TopicTitle: Hype Train 1.0.5: The Local Train Route

Articles.Content:
Type hrain

hyte prain

rhyte pain

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

my posts are much more exciting when i can type in all caps now and then :\

I think the antenna system depends on something in Unity 5.

Also I just want to say, based on the sudden... FLOOD... of information in the devnotes, my bets are all on next week. I think they are expecting a quick release personally. I think Max said that in a Squadcast not too long ago too.

Edited October 29, 2015 by Alshain

It has begun! I would like to purchase a Hype Ticket, also!

As for the release date, I'm placing bets on next Tuesday or the Tuesday after that, November 10th.
I'm not gonna be able to play anything till thanksgiving, so put me down for riding in the boxcar with the other hobos
Hype Hype Hype! You literally have no idea how excited I am for this update.

Type hrain

hyte prain

rhyte pain

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

my posts are much more exciting when i can type in all caps now and then :\

I just found out Protista is paraphyletic and isn't really a Kingdom. Why do you lie to me?

riding in the boxcar with the other hobos

That reminds me of a song (to the tune of 'King of the Road'):

Spaceships for sale or rent

Bargain prices - scratch and dent

No deals for rookies or vets

I ain't got no turbojets

One trash can full-o-boom

Might take you up to vacuum

I'm a kerb of means by no means

King of the void

Third transfer, changing plane

Destinations in my brain

Old worn out Kerbfleet struts

Ever since the budget cuts

I burn old boosters I have found

Short, but not too big around

I'm a kerb of means by no means

King of the void

I know every engineer of every spaceplane

All the controllers, and all of their names

I know every free snack at every stop

And every craft that ain't nailed down from Moho to Bop

I sing,

Spaceships for sale or rent...

Happy landings!
Now this is actually pulling me away from KSP for these couple of days.

I have one foot on this hype train, and one foot on the Fallout 4 hype train. Luckily, I have multiple [time span]s of experience navigating hypespace, so even though the trains are in different places and traveling at different speeds in different directions, I can maintain my position at least until one of them crashes reaches its destination.

Hype Hype Hype! You literally have no idea how excited I am for this update.

Me too. I REALLY want those little jet engines.
One ticket please

I'll take one business class ticket on the hype SeaTrain please...!

Weird Things I'm Hyped For:

-coreTemp means we can finally patch in proper boiloff

-The Mk. 1 crew cabin- oh my gorgeous

-Panther jet means that the Gen 5 Fighter Competition is finally useful

-New bouyancy model means MORE SHIIIIIIIPSSSS!

I am screaming inside, it's like a kid minutes before christmas

Oh my god jet engines

Oh dear kerbal those small ore tanks

Wowee! Real life cargo ramps! Yaaaayyyyy!!!!!

GOOD GOD WE HAVE SPACE SHUTTLE ENGINES

https://youtu.be/p5fOaBnlT2E?t=1m5s

One ticket please

I'll be in the restaurant carriage getting hapilly ratted. The inevitable crash won't hurt as much....

Cheers!

1 more ticket!

I am on

HYPE!

Finally a node on the aerospike engine!

I hope this is also the case for the jet engines, but we'll see...

Oh and, HYPE!!
Sea train, departing station:

Yay, HYPE! I can't wait to use all the new parts!

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, right... One ticket please!

Well Regex has not checked in to provide the needed snark to temper this hype, can it last without it?

Since we are all posting useless junk, take a moment to admire the 60x80 blanket I ordered from the walmart photo center:
One ticket, coach class please.
One ticket please!

Originally I was a little bemused by the amount of attention paid to water transport, but after a while of playing KSP and realizing that in many ways Kerbin is one of the most challenging places to explore, I understood! Looking forward to 1.05.

Well Regex has not checked in to provide the needed snark to temper this hype, can it last without it?

Please... allow me: "Meh. I'm so so about sea planes, and that other stuff I've been getting from RSS and RO for years now. Glad about bug fixes, but where's my optimization pass?" Does that just about cover it?

P.S. Nothing but respect for your work, Regex! Someone's gotta be the designated wet towel
is 1.0.5 supposed to go live next week?
Well, it is my birthday on Monday, so that would be a nice present.
